@ ice-ice:
mdf is a compression format better handled by either poweriso or magiciso.
http://thepiratebay.org/tor/4302182/PowerISO_v4.2_Incl_Keygen-DIGERATI
or 
http://thepiratebay.org/tor/4318804/MagicISO.Maker-v5.5.Build.271(with_serial)
hope this helps.

look like a nice game,,,

For those of you who are getting the "Writing the data failed" and "AR read failed" errors, this is because you have renamed the folder that the game was installed with.

Sadly it must stay as "DISCIPLINE" or you won't be able to save the game. So just go rename that folder and it should work without needing to change compatiblity.

For those of you who are getting the "Writing the data failed" and "AR read failed" errors, this is because you have renamed the folder that the game was installed with.

Sadly it must stay as "DISCIPLINE" or you won't be able to save the game. So just go rename that folder and it should work without needing to change compatiblity.
